> So, what's the purpose behind the Factory class?

It's meant to provide system writers with a convenient interface for creating entities from SDF. I'm using it on the [UserCommands system](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/241fb13dd0168e71de3ddc735747f462e5674312/src/systems/usercommands/UserCommands.cc?at=user_cmds&fileviewer=file-view-default#UserCommands.cc-48) and this will be the recommended way for systems to create entities programmatically, unless they want it to be queued as a user command, in which case they should use the `factory` service.

I'll update the design doc to make things clearer for everyone.
content.html:
So, what's the purpose behind the Factory class?

It's meant to provide system writers with a convenient interface for creating entities from SDF. I'm using it on the UserCommands system and this will be the recommended way for systems to create entities programmatically, unless they want it to be queued as a user command, in which case they should use the factory service.

I'll update the design doc to make things clearer for everyone.
